name: FakeLife
description:
Just an ultra-simple biological evolution simulator, with:

  • genes & mutations!
  • mineral resources
  • "algae" species
  • herbivorous animal species (coming soon!)
  • closed resources cycle (minerals -> plants -> animals -> minerals)

This is still a pre-alpha release, there are no controls to adjust the simulation yet.

TODO:
